failure_quote: SAT or ACT scores are required for admission consideration
what_needs_to_change: SAT/ACT requirement removed OR applicant takes SAT
notes: One of the world's most valuable scholarships (CAD 100k+) - worth considering SAT if this is top choice

failure_quote: Standardized test scores (SAT or ACT) are part of the holistic review
what_needs_to_change: SAT requirement waived OR test-optional policy adopted
notes: Extremely generous scholarship - contact admissions about waiver possibilities

failure_quote: English language proficiency evidence required (IELTS or equivalent)

notes: UK unis often accept A-levels - verify Warwick specific policy

failure_quote: Applicants must meet UCL's English language requirements
what_needs_to_change: Accept A-level English as waiver OR applicant takes IELTS
notes: UCL may accept Cambridge A-level English - verify policy

failure_quote: English language proficiency must be demonstrated

notes: Australian unis less likely to waive - but worth checking
